content.query:
-- Dimensión Fechas --
GO
CREATE  or ALTER view [etl].[vw_dim_Date] AS 
SELECT  idFechas AS idDate,
        ClaveFecha AS dateKey,
        Fecha AS date,
        COALESCE(Mes, 'D')  AS month,
        COALESCE(NumeroMes, -1)  AS monthNumber,
        COALESCE(Ano, -1)  AS year,
        COALESCE(NumeroSemana, -1)  AS weekNumber,
        COALESCE(DiaSemana, 'D') AS dayWeek,
        COALESCE(NumeroDiaSemana, -1)  AS dayWeekNumber,
        COALESCE(DiaAno, -1) AS yearDay,
        COALESCE(Trimestre, -1)  AS quarter,
        COALESCE(Cuatrimestre, -1)  AS quadrimester,
        CASE WHEN Cuatrimestre IN (1,2) THEN 1
            WHEN Cuatrimestre IN (2,4) THEN 2
            ELSE -1 END AS semester,
        fechaCarga AS loadDate,
        fechaDelta AS deltaDate
FROM [default].[dbo].[fechas]

-- Dimensión Artículos --
GO
CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [etl].[vw_dim_Articles] AS
SELECT  idArticulos AS idArticles,
        nombre AS name,
        COALESCE(codigoReferencia, 'D') AS externalCode,
        a.idTalla AS idSize,
        a.idColor AS idColor,
        a.idCategoria AS idCategory,
        a.idLinea AS idLine,
        idTemporada AS idSeason,
        COALESCE(descripcion, 'D') AS description,
        a.fechaCarga AS loadDate,
        a.fechaDelta AS deltaDate
FROM [default].[dbo].[articulos] AS a
LEFT JOIN [default].[dbo].[talla] AS t
    ON t.idTalla = a.idTalla
--LEFT JOIN [default].[dbo].[color] AS co
   -- ON co.idColor = a.idColor
LEFT JOIN [default].[dbo].[categoria] AS ca
    ON ca.idCategoria = a.idCategoria
LEFT JOIN [default].[dbo].[Linea] AS l
    ON l.idLinea = a.idLinea


-- Dimensión Almacenes --
GO
CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [etl].[vw_dim_Warehouse] AS
SELECT  idAlmacenes AS idWarehouse,
        a.nombre AS name AS warehouse,
        a.codigoAlmacen AS externalCode,
        p.codigoPais AS countryCode, 
        p.nombre AS country,
        a.Direccion AS adrees,
        a.ciudad AS city,
        a.descripcion AS description1,
        a.fechaCarga AS loadDate,
        a.fechaDelta AS deltaDate
FROM [default].[dbo].[almacenes] AS a
LEFT JOIN [default].[dbo].[pais] as p
    ON p.idpais = a.idPais


-- Dimensión Codigo Postal --
GO
CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [etl].[vw_dim_PostalCodes] AS
SELECT *
FROM [default].[dbo].[codigoPostal]


-- Dimensión Divisa --
GO
CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [etl].[vw_dim_Currency] AS
SELECT *
FROM [default].[dbo].[divisa]


-- Dimensión Horas --
GO
CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [etl].[vw_dim_Hour] AS
SELECT *
FROM [default].[dbo].[horas]


-- Dimensión Tarifa --
GO
CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [etl].[vw_dim_Tarriff] AS
SELECT *
FROM [default].[dbo].[tarifa]

-- Dimensión Tipo Operacion --
GO
CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [etl].[vw_dim_OperationType] AS
SELECT *
FROM [default].[dbo].[tipoOperacion]
